text: Angular Recording Corporation is an independent record label that was first based in New Cross, South East London. It was started in June 2003 by two ex- Goldsmiths College students, Joe Daniel and Joe Margetts. ==Artists== * Crystal Stilts * Findo Gask * Gyratory System * Je Suis Animal * Tim Key * Klaxons * The Lodger * The Long Blondes * Mitten * Navvy * These New Puritans * The Violets * David Westlake * Wetdog Angular Recording Corporation Category:2003 establishments in England
title: Angular Recording Corporation
